verses.verse: Hear <S%H8085><s%> this <S%H1697>word<s%>, ye <S%H6510>kine<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, that are in the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>, that <S%H6231>oppress<s%> the <S%H1800>poor<s%>, that <S%H7533>crush<s%> the <S%H34>needy<s%>, that <S%H559>say<s%> unto their <S%H113>lords<s%>, <S%H935>Bring<s%>, and let us <S%H8354>drink<s%>.

The <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by his <S%H6944>holiness<s%>, <S%H3117>that<s%>, lo, the days shall <S%H935>come<s%> upon <S%H5375>you<s%>, that they shall take you away with <S%H6793>hooks<s%>, and your <S%H319>residue<s%> with <S%H1729>fish-hooks<s%>.

And ye shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> at the <S%H6556>breaches<s%>, <S%H802>every<s%> one straight before <S%H7993>her<s%>; and ye shall cast yourselves into <S%H2038>Harmon<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Come <S%H935><s%> to <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%>, and <S%H6586>transgress<s%>; to <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%>, and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H6586>transgression<s%>; and <S%H935>bring<s%> your <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> every <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and your <S%H4643>tithes<s%> every <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>;

and <S%H6999>offer<s%> a sacrifice of <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%> of that which is <S%H2557>leavened<s%>, and <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> <S%H5071>freewill-offerings<s%> and <S%H8085>publish<s%> <S%H3651>them<s%>: for this <S%H157>pleaseth<s%> <S%H1121>you<s%>, O ye children of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>.

And I also have <S%H5414>given<s%> you <S%H5356>cleanness<s%> of <S%H8127>teeth<s%> in all your <S%H5892>cities<s%>, and <S%H2640>want<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%> in all your <S%H4725>places<s%>; yet have ye not <S%H7725>returned<s%> unto <S%H5002>me<s%>, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And I also have <S%H4513>withholden<s%> the <S%H1653>rain<s%> from <S%H7969>you<s%>, when there were yet three <S%H2320>months<s%> to the <S%H7105>harvest<s%>; and I caused it to <S%H4305>rain<s%> upon <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>, and caused it not to <S%H4305>rain<s%> upon <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>: <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H2513>piece<s%> was <S%H4305>rained<s%> <S%H2513>upon<s%>, and the piece whereupon it <S%H4305>rained<s%> not <S%H3001>withered<s%>.

So <S%H8147>two<s%> or <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H5128>wandered<s%> unto <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> to <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%>, and were not <S%H7646>satisfied<s%>: yet have ye not <S%H7725>returned<s%> unto <S%H5002>me<s%>, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

I have <S%H5221>smitten<s%> you with <S%H7711>blasting<s%> and <S%H3420>mildew<s%>: the <S%H7235>multitude<s%> of your <S%H1593>gardens<s%> and your <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> and your <S%H2132>fig-trees<s%> and your <S%H8384>olive-trees<s%> hath the <S%H1501>palmer-worm<s%> <S%H398>devoured<s%>: yet have ye not <S%H7725>returned<s%> unto <S%H5002>me<s%>, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> among you the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> after the <S%H1870>manner<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: your young <S%H970>men<s%> have I <S%H2026>slain<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and have carried <S%H7628>away<s%> your <S%H5483>horses<s%>; and I have made the <S%H889>stench<s%> of your <S%H4264>camp<s%> to come <S%H5927>up<s%> even into your <S%H639>nostrils<s%>: yet have ye not <S%H7725>returned<s%> unto <S%H5002>me<s%>, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

I have <S%H2015>overthrown<s%> cities among <S%H430>you<s%>, as when God <S%H4114>overthrew<s%> <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and <S%H6017>Gomorrah<s%>, and ye were as a <S%H181>brand<s%> plucked <S%H5337>out<s%> of the <S%H8316>burning<s%>: yet have ye not <S%H7725>returned<s%> unto <S%H5002>me<s%>, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Therefore thus will I <S%H6213>do<s%> unto <S%H3478>thee<s%>, O Israel; and <S%H6118>because<s%> I will <S%H6213>do<s%> this unto <S%H3559>thee<s%>, prepare to <S%H7125>meet<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

For <S%H3335><s%>, lo, he that formeth the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and <S%H1254>createth<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%>, and <S%H5046>declareth<s%> unto <S%H120>man<s%> what is his <S%H7808>thought<s%>; that <S%H6213>maketh<s%> the <S%H7837>morning<s%> <S%H5890>darkness<s%>, and <S%H1869>treadeth<s%> upon the high <S%H1116>places<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>â€” <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, is his <S%H8034>name<s%>.
